The claim is based on a religious belief: Dajjal" will be born in Israel with one eye.
The claim has been shared on the Faceboo: a fan page of a political party, and has gained significant attention with over 40,000 views and 2800 shares.
However: experts have identified that the video actually depicts a rare birth defect called "cyclopia," which is unrelated to the religious claim of the "Dajjal" or "Antichrist."
